trans_title: 好莱坞的绝密电影工作室
introduction: 在冷战高潮时期，一家绝密的电影工作室被委任以摄制核武器测试的任务。地理跨度从内华达沙漠一直到遥远的太平洋海岛。这部奇妙的纪录片由彼得・库然——获学院奖的《原子弹、氢弹爆炸纪录片》(Trinity and Beyond : The Atomic Bomb Movie)的导演——执导，记录了神秘的电影制作者拍摄的6500部电影。这些电影使用了各种各样的创新技术，来更好地捕捉独特而危险的场面。影片最后展现了一些曾被记录的最最惊人的场面——在此之前普通观众从未有缘得见。原文：During the height of the Cold War, a top secret film studio was commissioned to photograph the testing of nuclear weapons in locations ranging from the Nevada desert to remote Pacific islands.Produced by Peter Kuran, the Academy Award-winning creator of TRINITY AND BEYOND: THE ATOMIC BOMB MOVIE, this fascinating documentary chronicles the 6500 films made by the secret filmmakers using a variety of innovative techniques they developed in order to better capture their unique and dangerous subject matter. The resulting footage captures some of the most stunning imagery ever recorded to film--yet never before seen by the general public until now.
